languages.text: "Если вы считаете, что тассерианский минерал так важен для Империума — включите его в десятину. В чем проблема?"
"If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"
languages.original_text: "Если вы считаете, что тассерианский минерал так важен для Империума — включите его в десятину. В чем проблема?"

traits.locale_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"
"If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"
"If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"
"If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"
"If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"
"If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

languages.text: Wenn Ihr das Mineral von Thassera für so wichtig für das Imperium haltet, macht es zu einem Teil des Zehnts. Wo liegt das Problem?"
languages.original_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

traits.locale_text: Wenn Ihr das Mineral von Thassera für so wichtig für das Imperium haltet, macht es zu einem Teil des Zehnts. Wo liegt das Problem?"

languages.text: « Si vous estimez que le minerai thasserien est si important pour l'Imperium, intégrez-le à la dîme. Je ne vois pas où est le problème. »
languages.original_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous estimez que le minerai thasserien est si important pour l'Imperium, intégrez-le à la dîme. Je ne vois pas où est le problème. »

languages.text: “既然你觉得塔瑟拉的矿物对帝国那么重要，那把它加到什一税资源清单里就好了，这有什么问题吗？”
languages.original_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

traits.locale_text: “既然你觉得塔瑟拉的矿物对帝国那么重要，那把它加到什一税资源清单里就好了，这有什么问题吗？”

languages.text: «Si cree que el mineral thasseriano es tan importante para el Imperium, haga que sea parte del diezmo. ¿Qué problema hay?».
languages.original_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

traits.locale_text: «Si cree que el mineral thasseriano es tan importante para el Imperium, haga que sea parte del diezmo. ¿Qué problema hay?».

languages.text: 「タッセーラの鉱物が帝国にとってそれほど重要なら、租税に組み込めばいいだろう。何が問題なんだ？」
languages.original_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラの鉱物が帝国にとってそれほど重要なら、租税に組み込めばいいだろう。何が問題なんだ？」

languages.text: "Thassera'daki madenin İmparatorluk için bu kadar önemli olduğunu düşünüyorsanız aşara dâhil edin. Burada sorun nedir?"
languages.original_text: "If you think the Thasserian mineral is so important to the Imperium, make it part of the tithe. What is the problem?"

traits.locale_text: "Thassera mineralinin, İmparatorluk için bu kadar önemli olduğunu düşünüyorsanız aşara dâhil edin. Burada sorun nedir?"
